page.title: 14TRANSPORT
page.content: Holmes Chapel is situated 1 mile east of the busy M6 at Junction 18. The A54 Buxton to Chester and A50 Warrington to Newcastle roads cross in the village. Public transport is provided by British Rail with an hourly service to Manchester and Crewe. Crossville Bus Co. run a very infrequent service to outlying towns. Buses run regularly to Sandbach market on Thursdays. Most people have private cars. In a survey of 210 families the following was recorded: {Number of families Number of cars 7 0 104 1 95 2 4 2+ Most traffic is found between the hours of 11.30_12.30 a.m. and 5.30_6.30 p.m.
